__e: I remember the day the girls came over for bridge club.
Perhaps after dinner, we could have a rubber or two of bridge, eh, Colonel?
I'd have been one of them amity types that thinks that playing bridge is the best thing that life has to offer.
[ FIRST DAY OF SUMMER HOLIDAYS ] Matters of consequence for the serious and sensible man and... We did it!
How easy Bridge and I have it.
I had bread. And when I-
